text: `@avx` is equivalent to something like `@inbounds @simd` if the loop is only 1D, right?

elements.text: if the loop is only 1D, right?

text: No. It also does unrolling and manual vectorization instructions

elements.text: No. It also does unrolling and manual vectorization instructions

text: also, it has special vectorized forms of special functions (trig, exponentials, etc)  that can be much more efficient
